line: hey rach listen did you know that during pregnancy your fingers swell up to twice their size and never go back
you fall for it every time
i brought you my old maternity clothes
oh pheebs that’s so sweet ooh those are so cute
and look see how they expand as the baby grows
and then after the baby’s born they’re great for shoplifting melons
remember that guy will colbert from high school
he was in ross’s class marching band kinda overweight
i mean i was his thin friend
honey are you sure you’re not talking about your imaginary boyfriend
i haven’t thought about him in a long time anyway umm will’s will’s here on business and he didn’t have a place to go so i invited him here
oh and by the way he’s lost a bunch of weight
i mean he looks goo ood
okay i mean really really gorgeous
i just want you to say it once in a while
all right okay just so you know i’m not gonna make a turkey this year
they’re ugly and stupid and delicious
will’s still on a diet chandler doesn’t eat thanksgiving food and rachel’s having her aversion to poultry
remember i had to leave the room the other day when you had that roast chicken
but i thought that was because i put the whole thing on my hand and made it walk across the table
anyway it just doesn’t seem worth it to make a whole turkey for just three people
but you gotta have turkey on thanksgiving
i mean thanksgiving with no turkey is like like fourth of july with no apple pie
or friday with no two pizzas
if it means that much to you
but just there’s gonna be a ton left over
i promise i will finish that turkey
all right you’re telling me you can eat an entire turkey in just one sitting
and this is what we do
i mean we may not be great thinkers or world leaders we don’t read a lot or run very fast but damnit
hey isn’t weird to think about how next year at this time they’ll be a little baby at the table
but good to know where you’re at
anything i can do to help
chandler usually helps me with this but he’s really into the game so i don’t want to bother him
could you help me fold these napkins
i’m gonna go across the hall to check on the yams
we’re not at a barn dance
you’ve gotta you wanna fold them like swans
like i showed you at christmas time remember
yeah it all just came screaming back to me
i’m just pretending to watch the game so i don’t have to help out with stuff
every once and a while i just scream stuff at the tv
well i want to get in on this
i don’t think i can help you after all i didn’t realize this game was on
oh i didn’t know you liked football
well normally i don’t but y’know green bay is playing
well it’s only like my favorite bay
it just gets a little cold in winter but in wisconsin winter only lasts from august to june
god will i’m so glad that you came
yeah i’m gonna be in one of those subway sandwich commercials
all right it’s no fat it’s no sugar it’s no dairy it’s no good
this is uh this is my husband chandler
i’d shake your hand but uh i’m really into the game
plus i think it’d be better for my ego if we didn’t stand right next to each other
monica i can’t get over how great you look
i’m watching the game but i’m not deaf
oh umm i meant to tell you ross is coming
it’s just uh god i hated her
she was horrible to me in high school
but hey it was a long time ago i’m in a good place it might be actually fun to see her again
you got any cakes or cookies or something
y’know it’s been a while since we’ve screamed something
you gotta save room you’ve got almost an entire turkey to eat
let me explain to you how the human body works
i have to warm my stomach first
don’t worry tribbianis never get full
i actually know what you’re talking about
i’m here to tell you something my friend you can eat and eat and eat but nothing will ever fill that void
who the hell is this guy
it’s good to see you man
man so so what are you up to
man i don’t think i’ve seen you since uh lance davis’ graduation party
that was such a fun night
it would’ve been good if we had gotten in but still real fun
god we were lame back then
do you remember how into dinosaurs we were
so what do you what do you do now
so how long are you in town
are are you gonna be okay
just god i hate her ross
will high school was was a long time ago
look at her standing there with those yams
my two greatest enemies ross rachel green and complex carbohydrates
oh my god monica who is that
he is really got that sexy smoldering thing going on
oh my god he’s look at the way he’s just staring at me
i think he’s trying to mouth something to me but i can’t make it out
well the lions technically won but it was a moral victory for the green bay mermen
i gotta tell you though i am i am having the hardest time placing you
did we umm did we fool around at lance davis’ graduation party
rachel why don’t you sit here
and will you sit way over there
even if nobody helps me i can eat that no problem
at least give me a challenge
it’s like me when i was born
all right who would uh like some yams
oh you’d like that wouldn’t ya
can we please keep the chicken and the turkey and everything on the other side of the table
typical of you rachel green queen rachel does whatever she wants in little rachel land
do you do you have a problem with me
apparently you were umm a little mean to him in high school
i’m i’m i had no idea
but you you’ve worked so hard
uh will umm i just want to say that i’m real sorry for whatever i i did to you in high school
that’s right the i hate rachel green club
so what you all just joined together to hate me
who else was in this club
no need to point she knows who ross is
so you were in an i hate rachel club
so who else was in this club
uh actually there there was also that exchange student from thailand but i i don’t think he he knew what it was
so ross we went out for two years and you never told me you were in an i hate rachel club
it’s not like it was binding forever
then why did it have the word eternity in it
okay monica did you know about this
is that why you guys used to go up to your bedroom and lock the door
hmm a little relieved i gotta say
look rach i i’m sorry okay
i i was a stupid kid okay
co founded the club was because i was insanely in love with you
obviously i didn’t handle it very well
but if you think about it the i hate rachel club was really the i love rachel club
uh except that it was really the i hate rachel club
you guys would just like get together and like just say mean things about me
well we did a little more than that
just take off your shirt and tell us
we we said that the rumor was that umm you had both male and female reproductive parts
we said your parents flipped a coin decided to raise you as a girl but you still had a hint of a pen1s
everyone at our school heard it
everybody at my school heard it
you were the hermaphrodite cheerleader from long island
this is all making so much sense to me now
this is why adam carter wouldn’t go out with me
this is why billy tratt would just stay in this region
actually billy tratt is gay now
so so that one’s not really our fault
monica how come you never told me this
i thought it might be true
and i was afraid that you were gonna cry and then show it to me
i’m afraid i’m gonna need proof
joey you don’t have to finish that
today i’m just a guy who can’t finish a turkey but tomorrow i’m the guy who eats half a powerbar wraps up the rest and puts in the fridge
no i just i just i gotta change my pants
listen to what sean mcmahon wrote in my yearbook senior year dear rach you’re such a good person
rach i think you’re reading a little too much into it
dear rach you’re a great person
look what do you want me to do
do you want me to call everyone in the entire school and tell them it wasn’t true
could you also tell them i’m skinny now
well look look i’m not calling anybody
it was like a million years ago
i don’t care how long ago it was
you told people that i was half and half
i just want to point out i never did anything to hurt you in high school
well you you did start that rumor about ross making out with mrs
i saw you guys going at it behind the card catalog
she also made out with takaka ci kek the night before he went back to thailand
when you were in high school you made out with a 50 year old woman
ohh there’s a picture of her in the yearbook actually
well she probably wasn’t familiar with the process having spent most of her life sitting for oil paintings
did she did she lure you to an early bird dinner
i was working late in the library one afternoon
it was just the two of us
she needed some help with her word jumble
and one thing led to another
if you must know anita was very gentle and tender
didn’t she walk with a cane
i can’t believe you you told people about this
i never got to be in a club
i i didn’t go to high school but three of us would meet behind a dumpster to learn french
you guys have your stupid little club but i would just like to say is what you did to me is way worse than what i did to you
you gave me a tiney wienie
all right listen you’re just being silly
rachel even with that rumor you were one of the most popular girls in school and everyone wanted to be like you
one girl wanted to be like you so much she stuffed her pants with a tootsie roll
and ross if it weren’t for rachel’s rumor i mean no one in high school would even know who you were
she put you on the map
as a romancer of the elderly
altman was the kind of woman you could tell she used to be pretty
hey guys this stuff is just so way in the past
you you’ve been through so much since then
and right now you’ve got so much more important stuff going on in your life
can’t you just let this go
i mean we are having a baby together
so you knocked her up but you’re not gonna marry her
it’s exactly how i’d imagined it would be
well joey we’re all we’re all very proud of you
yes i believe we can expect a call from the president any moment now
is there anything we can do for you
no just nobody press on my stomach
you can keep those pants by the way
whoa hey wh wh what do you got there
ah just cut me a little sliver
are you afraid you’re gonna run out
